copy.verb5_19001: Drag the rocks off the Truffle so they don't crush it!
copy.verb4_19001: Click to help the Truffle outgrow the weeds!
copy.verb0_19001: Drag the vines off the Truffle to untangle it!
copy.verb6_19001: Shake the branch to hide the Truffle with falling leaves!
copy.verb3_19001: Click on the water drops to clean mud off the Truffle!
copy.verb7_19001: Move soil on top of the Truffle to protect it!
copy.verb2_19001: Drag the fireflies on to the Truffle to keep it warm!
copy.verb1_19001: Move the music notes onto the scared Truffle to calm it down!
copy.verb0_19002: Move the spider silk onto the Spider's web to fix it!
copy.verb1_19002: Shake the scoop to sprinkle pixie dust to calm the nervous Spider!
copy.verb6_19002: Shake the branch to hide the Spider with the falling leaves!
copy.verb5_19002: Remove the web threads from the Spider!
copy.verb7_19002: Click on the bandages to heal the Spider!
copy.verb2_19002: Keep clicking on the sun to warm the Spider up!
copy.verb3_19002: Drag the droplets onto the toad to splash it away from the Spider!
copy.verb4_19002: Drag the leaves onto the web to grow a hiding place for the Spider!
copy.verb2_19003: Move the stars onto the Firefly to increase his glow!
copy.verb7_19003: Remove the burs from the Firefly to cure his itchy wings!
copy.verb6_19003: Click on the moths to distract them from the Firefly!
copy.verb0_19003: Click on the wilting grass to fix the Firefly's home!
copy.verb4_19003: Shake the honeycomb to drop honey to feed the Firefly!
copy.verb5_19003: Click and drag the tangled ivy off the Firefly to free him!
copy.verb3_19003: Drag droplets onto a bat to splash it away from the Firefly!
copy.verb1_19003: Roll over the music notes to sing a calming song to the fearful Firefly!
copy.verb1_19004: Click on the speech bubbles to warn the Lizard about dangers!
copy.verb3_19004: Shake the raincloud to give the Lizard a bath!
copy.verb2_19004: Drag sunshine onto the Lizard to keep her warm!
copy.verb5_19004: Drag the raindrops into the leaf cup to get the Lizard a drink!
copy.verb0_19004: Drag the twigs onto the twig nest to help build the Lizard a home!
copy.verb4_19004: Keep clicking on the Lizard to help her grow bigger!
copy.verb7_19004: Drag the leaves onto the Lizard to protect her from the cold!
copy.verb6_19004: Click on the stinging wasps to protect the Lizard!
copy.verb0_19005: Drag the leaves onto the Butterfly to help her build a place to rest!
copy.verb5_19005: Click on the Butterfly's friends to help them leave the Wilderness!
copy.verb4_19005: Keep clicking the flower to grow the Butterfly a snack!
copy.verb2_19005: Roll over the lanterns to guide the Butterfly out of the Wilderness!
copy.verb6_19005: Shake the maracas to distract this prankster Butterfly!
copy.verb1_19005: Roll over the arrows to give the Butterfly directions to a safe place!
copy.verb7_19005: Drag the injuries off the Butterfly to heal her!
copy.verb3_19005: Click on the dangerous fire ants to splash them away from the Butterfly!
copy.verb3_19006: Drag water onto the muddy Bird to help wash him!
copy.verb4_19006: Drag the twigs onto the nest to teach the Bird how to make a nest!
copy.verb6_19006: Click the berries to lure the Bird out of the Wilderness!
copy.verb5_19006: Roll over the arrows to guide the Bird to a safe tree to rest!
copy.verb0_19006: Click the seeds to show the Bird how to crack them open!
copy.verb7_19006: Drag the bandages onto the Bird to heal his sprained wing!
copy.verb2_19006: Roll over to light the fireflies so the Bird can see in the dark!
copy.verb1_19006: Click on the speech bubbles to tell the Bird how to avoid hawks!
copy.verb7_19007: Click the thermometers until they are full to check on the sick Squirrel!
copy.verb5_19007: Remove the thorns to save the Squirrel!
copy.verb6_19007: Shake the branch to distract the Squirrel with acorns!
copy.verb4_19007: Drag the acorns onto the pile to teach the Squirrel to store food!
copy.verb0_19007: Drag the hammers onto the hut to help build the Squirrel's home!
copy.verb1_19007: Click on the speech bubbles to tell the Squirrel how to avoid poison ivy!
copy.verb3_19007: Click on the water vines to keep the Squirrel from getting stuck!
copy.verb2_19007: Drag sunlight onto the Squirrel to warm her up!
copy.verb1_19008: Roll over the frog prints to warn the Frog not to stray far from his pond!
copy.verb3_19008: Shake the rainclouds to keep the Frog's skin wet!
copy.verb4_19008: Keep clicking the lily pad to grow a new home for the Frog!
copy.verb7_19008: Click on the flower cups to fill them with medicine for the sick Frog!
copy.verb6_19008: Click on the speech bubbles to scare away dangerous animals!
copy.verb2_19008: Click on the exclamations to illuminate the pond for dangers!
copy.verb5_19008: Click on the leaves to collect them for a new sitting spot for the Frog!
copy.verb0_19008: Drag the scissors onto the vines to help the Frog get unstuck!
